org.apache.jena.geosparql.spatial.SpatialIndex

    Package Description
    org.apache.jena.geosparql.spatial  

    • Uses of SpatialIndex in org.apache.jena.geosparql.spatial

      Methods in org.apache.jena.geosparql.spatial that return SpatialIndex 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static SpatialIndex SpatialIndex.buildSpatialIndex​(Dataset dataset)
      Build Spatial Index from all graphs in Dataset.
      Dataset contains SpatialIndex in Context.
      SRS URI based on most frequent found in Dataset.
      static SpatialIndex SpatialIndex.buildSpatialIndex​(Dataset dataset, java.io.File spatialIndexFile)
      Build Spatial Index from all graphs in Dataset.
      Dataset contains SpatialIndex in Context.
      SRS URI based on most frequent found in Dataset.
      Spatial Index written to file.
      static SpatialIndex SpatialIndex.buildSpatialIndex​(Dataset dataset, java.lang.String srsURI)
      Build Spatial Index from all graphs in Dataset.
      Dataset contains SpatialIndex in Context.
      static SpatialIndex SpatialIndex.buildSpatialIndex​(Dataset dataset, java.lang.String srsURI, java.io.File spatialIndexFile)
      Build Spatial Index from all graphs in Dataset.
      Dataset contains SpatialIndex in Context.
      Spatial Index written to file.
      SpatialIndex SpatialIndexStorage.getSpatialIndex()  
      static SpatialIndex SpatialIndex.load​(java.io.File spatialIndexFile)
      Load a SpatialIndex from file.
      Index will be built and empty if file does not exist or is null.
      static SpatialIndex SpatialIndex.retrieve​(ExecutionContext execCxt)
      Retrieve the SpatialIndex from the Context.
      Methods in org.apache.jena.geosparql.spatial with parameters of type SpatialIndex 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.HashSet<Resource> SearchEnvelope.check​(SpatialIndex spatialIndex)  
      static void SpatialIndex.setSpatialIndex​(Dataset dataset, SpatialIndex spatialIndex)
      Set the SpatialIndex into the Context of the Dataset for later retrieval and use in spatial functions.
